node.name: Wet Cat Food MAKE: WHISKAS
node.description: Complete nutrition and is an irresistible cat food that provide balance nutrition for growth. A cat's love for fish is thoughtfully blended with loads of calcium, phosphorous, proteins, antioxidants, vitamins and minerals. Texture and aroma that appeals to the palate of feline and attracts even fussy eaters. (WEIGHT: 4 Kg / FEEDING INTERVAL: Thrice a day)
node.content:
1. Cats are obligate carnivores, which means they need to eat meat and a strong smell of fish is likely why its cat favorite food. 
2. This cat food contains Zinc, taurine and Omega-6 fatty acids which is good for healthy skin.
3. In a single package 48 pouches are provided and it is recommended that kitten's age up to 3 months at least 3 pouches must be provided in a day.
4. Home prepared diets frequently provide inadequate nutrition for cats therefore along with home meals must feed them with cat food.
5. It helps to maintain cat fur, heart-health, weight, skin, teeth, muscles, bones and overall immunity.
6. Cat lovers are recommended to take this 16-day eatery course for better growth of their kittens.
node.alt: Whiskas Kitten 212 months Wet Cat Food Tuna in Jelly Monthly Pack 48 Pouches 48  85g

node.name: Adult Dry Dog Food MAKE: PEDIGREE
node.description: Pedigree has a balance taste for all dogs and adding into the dogs diet will provide sufficient nutrition required by its body. Digestive system of dogs is different than humans and oil cooked food create problems. (WEIGHT: 22 Kg / FEEDING INTERVAL: Thrice a day)
node.content:
1. Pedigree should be provided alone and no other home recipe should be added along with it.
2. Do not test the Pedigree as Cat or Fish food.
3. Dogs weight up to 25-50 kg or in its adult age needs 500 grams of nutrients per day.
4. It’s a very simple procedure, just wet the pedigree granule with water and let the dog eat after 10 minutes.
5. On opening the pack, store Pedigree dog food in an air-tight container, in a cool & dry place.
6. As per customers review, ideal for Pugs, Beagle, Labrador, Golden Retriever & German Shepherd.
node.alt: Pedigree Adult Dry Dog Food Meat & Vegetables 22kg Pack

node.name: Complete Fish Food MAKE: TETRA BITS
node.description: Ingredients: Fish & fish derivatives, vegetable protein extract, cereals, derivatives of vegetables origin, molluscs and crustaceans, yeast, minerals, algae, oil and fats. Food gets sink down completely and eat by all breeds available in Indian market. (WEIGHT: 380 grams / FEEDING INTERVAL: Twice a day)
node.content:
1. For a variety of fish in an aquarium, use a combination of food, such as floating foods, slow-sinking foods, and rapidly sinking foods to ensure they're getting the nutrition they need.
2. Adult fish can be fed once a day and one should feed the fish only what they will eat in five minutes if there is food left after that time then feeding too much.
3. Tetra bits food is mainly for betta species like splendens, mahachaie, smaragdina, and tomi but can also feed to other tropical species as well like Barbs & Arowana.
4. 380 grams is enough for one month if given to 5 fishes for 2 times a day.
5. Do not put the food in open condition and that’s why the close container is provided.
node.alt: Tetra Bits Complete Fish Food for Growth and Health 300g1000ml

node.name: Adult Dry Dog Food MAKE: PEDIGREE
node.description: Contains 20% crude protein, 10% crude fat, and 5% crude fibre which makes it perfect food for adult dogs. Dogs easily get attacked by diseases through foods and Pedigree ensure that it will not happen while consuming it. Provides strong muscles, bones, teeth and healthier, shinier coat. (WEIGHT: 10 Kg / FEEDING INTERVAL: Thrice a day)
node.content:
1. Pedigree is an American company, specialized in dog food that offers guaranteed nutrition, palatability, digestibility, safety, and convenience.
2. In basic concept dogs need twice of all nutrients required by humans and Pedigree contains calcium, iron, and Vitamin that makes dogs healthier.
3. Dogs weight up to 10 kg or at its early age needs 200 grams of nutrients per day.
4. It’s a very simple procedure, just wet the pedigree granule with water and let the dog eat after 10 minutes.
5. After opening the pack, store Pedigree dog food in an air-tight container, in a cool & dry place.
6. As per customers' review, ideal for Pugs, Beagle, Labrador, Golden Retriever & German Shepherd.
node.alt: Pedigree Adult Dry Dog Food Meat & Rice 10kg Pack
